pageTitle: Submit questions for Beltway Baseball Live | Nats Insider
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {35417=Make sure to tune in at 1:30 p.m. tomorrow to find out if we selected your question., 35936=Chase Hughes and I will have another live edition of Beltway Baseball tomorrow at 1:30 p.m. on CSNwashington.com (also live-streamed here on NatsInsider.com). And this week we’ve got a new twist: We’ll be answering a few questions from all of you., 36398=Apr 26, 2011, 11:58 PM EDT, 10271=If the Nationals are converting Bryce Harper into a CF, why the reported interest in BJ Upton and other CFs now? Why spend money on a 1-year player for a team that is not going to contend this year unless Willie Mays circa 1954 walks in the door tomorrow?How many more errors does Ian Desmond need to commit before the Nationals move Danny Espinosa to SS and either a) move Desmond to 2nd; or b) push Desmond down to Syracuse to get better at SS and then bring him back up?}
